General.Name: Ihlas Haber Ajansi AS
General.Description: Ihlas Haber Ajansi A.S operates as a news agency in Turkey and internationally. The company offers SNG facilities, live shots, tape playout, field camera crews, ENG crews, editing operations, and studio facilities. Ihlas Haber Ajansi A.S was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Merkez Mah. 29 October Cad, Istanbul, Turkey, 34197
